title: All bronzes please read this post before complaining on boards

replies.body: ur only silver 1 yourself lol nothing to be proud of

Who said I was proud. I'm still likely to have a clue about the game rather than the bronzies on here saying every champ is broken. 
Exhibit A: Bipolar whose post you just commented on.

Silver Elo are probably the worst to comment on broken champs.  I know because im playing on both a bronze and silver account. 
Don't give bronzies stereo typical grief like that. Ur not at an Elo to be able to do so.

the majority of what people complain about is probably some sort of a legit problem. riot doesnt fix many problems or issues we have with league because

1 it takes too much time
2 it doesnt give riot the phat cash like them AWESOME CHROMA PACKS. BOY HOWDY
3 we're all used to not getting what we want in this game, on the rift and from riot
